Description: Sandal for the right foot of a child, made of plaited reed and palm leaves and papyrus, covered with black resin, complete with upper of which heel is broken away, part of toe straps remaining.
Bibliographic references: Veldmeijer 2009b / Studies of ancient Egyptian footwear. Technological aspects. Part XII. Fibre shoes (100, 102, 113, fig.1d)
